committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To clarify that the Upper Missouri River Breaks National Monument does not include within its boundaries any privately owned property, and for other purposes.
short_title: Upper Missouri River Breaks Boundary Clarification Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Upper Missouri River Breaks Boundary Clarification Act - Specifies that the Upper Missouri River Breaks National Monument shall not include any privately owned property within its boundaries.

titles.title: Upper Missouri River Breaks Boundary Clarification Act
Upper Missouri River Breaks Boundary Clarification Act
To clarify that the Upper Missouri River Breaks National Monument does not include within its boundaries any privately owned property, and for other purposes.
